dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action, seizing opportunities without hesitation and facing challenges head-on.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertainty with trepidation, weighing risks carefully before taking decisive action.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on rational reasoning, evaluating data through a systematic and methodical process.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, making decisions based on gut feelings and creative insight.

dimensions.label: Data-Driven Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on empirical evidence, using data to inform and guide their choices.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, making decisions based on personal experience and emotional insight.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer one-on-one interactions, valuing depth over breadth in social relationships.
Your FarTwin will thrive in group settings, enjoying the energy and stimulation of diverse perspectives.

dimensions.label: Media Consumption Preference
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin consume media?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out detailed, immersive content that delves deep into a subject.
Your FarTwin will enjoy a wide range of media, exploring different genres and topics.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on abstract ideas and theoretical frameworks, using creative language to convey their vision.
Your FarTwin will prioritize tangible results, using hands-on experimentation and iterative design to bring their ideas to life.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize adaptability, adjusting to changing circumstances and opportunities as they arise.
Your FarTwin will rely on a schedule and routine, using time-blocking to stay focused and productive.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaboration as a competition, seeking to outdo and outmaneuver their peers.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and mutual support, working together to achieve common goals.
